title: Buddy Boy
overview: Yuho, an 18-year-old boy who took refuge in a quiet rural village due to his parents' bankruptcy.Even at a glance, Yuho exudes the image of a boy who grew up only in the city.While walking along the valley path and meditating, he spots a girl (Lina) and a boy (Jin Goo) who appear to be around the same age splashing in the water.Yuho sees beauty and a strange excitement for the first time in his life as he sees their sparkling figures together with Yunseul in the valley...
